name: BL0CK
description:
Fill the blocks in line to remove the space marked with dots.
Remove all the dots to level up !!!
Clear them in combo or cross them to gain bonus points.

● FEATURES
- Level System
- Combo, Cross, and Multi Line Bonus
- Insert, Eraser, Shuffle, and Continue items
- GameCenter Leaderboards

● REQUIREMENTS
- iOS 9.0 or later
- iPadOS 13.1 or later

● SUPPORT E-MAIL : support@sharpapp.com
